snippet: Sierra Leone has cut its 2014 economic growth forecast to 7 or 8 percent as an Ebola outbreak cripples business in the iron ore-exporting West African country, the government said on Wednesday....

headline.print_headline: Economic Growth Forecasts Cut for Ebola-Hit West African Nations
headline.main: Economic Growth Forecasts Cut for Ebola-Hit West African Nations

lead_paragraph: Sierra Leone has cut its 2014 economic growth forecast to 7 or 8 percent as an Ebola outbreak cripples business in the iron ore-exporting West African country, the government said on Wednesday.
